JOB DESCRIPTION: Key Skills: JBPM 7.x, Spring, Hibernate, HTML 5, Javascript, JSP, Apache, Mysql, Linux     Primary Responsibilities:      Must have extensive experience in Java, JSP,   JBPM 7.x, Hibernate, Spring, Javascript/ Jquery, JSON,       Should have exposure to Apache/ tomcat,     Excellent knowledge of OOP, Data Structures, Algorithms and problem solving skills     Should have worked extensively in either of MySQL/Oracle/MS SQL     Should have experience in configuration management SVN, Git, Bit Bucket, version and repository management     Should be aware of Linux based deployments     Should be Strong in DB/SQL, Mysql, Stored procedures     Should have extremely good knowledge on SDLC processes and agile methodology     Strong understanding and knowledge in Java Unit Testing frameworks.     Must have expertise on JBPM 7.x and hands-on experience in design and development of complex apps, not just web-based apps/management apps     Must have strong exposure to Client account, interaction, technical systems     At least 2 years of experience in leading a team of 5 people+     Secondary skills      Strong Team management, Leadership and People Skills     Excellent communication skills     Ability to learn new technologies with minimal time period     Responsibilities:     Will be involved in redesign and rearchitecting existing product built on Java, JBPM 7.x, Liferay and related technologies along with hands on coding, design activities and R&D     Will be involved in client interaction regarding requirements, issues and deployments     Should manage, mentor and be responsible for a small team of 2 or more developers working on the product
